title: Textile, "Coriolanus and Scipio", ca. 1825
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
markings: "Buquet, D & Sculp." for Buquet designer and engraver.
dimensions:
113 x 73.5 cm (44 1/2 x 28 15/16 in.)
Warp is the first measurement.
description: Two different stories, that of Coriolanus and that of Scipio, printed in red on a background of chickens. There is text in French under each of the scenes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Coriolanus and Scipio", ca. 1825.
ca. 1825. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-152.
